DataElement.preferredDefinition: yes/no question related to patient's permission for use of their tissue (a group or layer of cells that are alike and that work together to perform a specific function).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to patient's permission for use of their tissue (a group or layer of cells that are alike and that work together to perform a specific function) or serum (the clear liquid part of the blood that remains after blood cells and clotting proteins have been removed).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: No value exists.:Permission to do something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did the patient consent to tu
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient consent to tumor tissue

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission for pharmacogenetic testing on her/his tissue samples

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Your tissue, from surgery and intra-peritoneal chemotherapy (HIPEC), may be collected and used for the research study

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is a sample from the primary tumor available for submission

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF_Text_5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is a sample from surgery available for submission

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree to the additional tissue collection (collected at same time as the standard of care) procedure.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient consent to a sample of tumor from the biopsy and related information to be kept in a Biobank for use in future research related to the BR005 study?
